import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import { Nav, Navbar, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from "react-redux" import {logout} from "../actions/userActions" const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state=>state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin ? userLogin : false; console.log(userInfo,"userInfo") console.log(userLogin,"userLogin") const logoutHandler = ()=>{ dispatch(logout()) } return (
Shop
Cart {userLogin ? ( Profile Logout ) : Sign In }
) } export default Header
